title: Albumin testing in urine using a smart-phone
excerpt: We build a platform to test albumin in urine on a smartphone. I develped the image processing code to test the albimin content.
citation: Coskun, A. F., Nagi, R., Sadeghi, K., Phillips, S., & Ozcan, A. (2013). Albumin testing in urine using a smart-phone. Lab on a Chip, 13(21), 4231-4238.

title: Cellphone microsphere fluorescence immunoassay for the detection of rbST biomarker in milk extracts
venue: Protein biomarker-based screening for detection of recombinant bovine somatotropin abuse in dairy cows
excerpt: We develop a method for detecting protien biomarkers in dairy cow milk on a cell phone. I developed the image processing algorithms to detect and count the biomarkers in the images.
citation: Ludwig, S. K. J., Zhu, H., Phillips, S., Shiledar, A., Feng, S., & Tseng, D. Cellphone microsphere fluorescence immunoassay for the detection of rbST biomarker in milk extracts. Protein biomarker-based screening for detection of recombinant bovine somatotropin abuse in dairy cows, 163.
